text: Va ʙa jod ovar ej pajomʙar, cun guruhe az cinhoro nazdi tu ravona kardem, to Qur'onro ʙisnavand. Cun ʙa nazdas rasidand va Pajomʙar (sallallohu alajhi va sallam) Qur'on mexond, guftand: «Xomus ʙosed, to Qur'onro ʙisnavem! Pas cun tilovati Qur'on ʙa pojon rasid hamono Qur'on ʙa onho ta'sir kard, onho ʙa sui qavmi xud, husdordihanda ʙozgastand, to onhoro az azoʙi Ilohi ʙitarsonand, agar imon naorand
